A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: great addition to the Star Wars universe! People are too difficult to please these days. there's not much more I could ask for in a Star Wars movie. it hit all the right beats\, has phenomenal character arcs and some great throwbacks to the original trilogy. the acting is great\, the direction is solid\, the jokes appropriately timed and funny and great visual effects. a movie should be judged on how it makes you feel at a gut level. and this movie\, in every way felt like a Star Wars movie. Perfect 5/7
